question.title: Find Customer Referee
hints: Be careful of the NULL value
mysqlSchemas: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS customer (id INT,name VARCHAR(25),referee_id INT);
insert into customer (id, name, referee_id) values ('1', 'Will', 'None')
